Officers responding to a 2:30 p.m. call from a family member found Mike George deceased .
George served as news director of KBTX Media from 2008 to 2013 .
He continued to contribute at KBTX , officials there said .
He continued to contribute at KBTX , officials there said .
George , an Emmy - winning journalist , began his news career at KBTX as an anchor , reporter and executive producer in 1986 .
Throughout his career , George won more than two dozen awards for his work , including Emmys and Edward R. Murrow awards .
He graduated from Texas State University and served on the board of Texas Associated Press Broadcasters .
